content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the district court of utena the defendant was ordered to pay a stamp duty and court fees the court awarded the defendant an apartment but also ordered them to pay the applicant a financial compensation the case involved the dissolution of a marriage establishment of residence and access arrangements for a minor child financial support for the child and division of property the court heard from witnesses and considered arguments from both parties the court dissolved the marriage determined the childs residence and ordered the division of property the court also deferred the payment of compensation and considered outstanding debts of the defendant the court upheld some claims and dismissed others determining the proportion of costs to be paid by each party the defendant will no longer be able to use the applicants married name the community property will be divided with the defendant being awarded the apartment and ordered to pay the applicant a financial compensation in monthly installments additionally the applicant made a claim for the declaration of debts owed to a creditor which the defendant is required to pay the funds collected will benefit the state

metadata.cost: 167.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 5.57 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant
